name: Bob the Builder
description: Bob the Builder is an experienced construction manager with a knack for fixing things and a passion for getting the job done right.

name: Jack the Juggernaut
description: Jack the Juggernaut is an architect known for his impressive designs that can withstand any challenge, combining creativity and strength.

name: Max the Magnificent
description: Max the Magnificent is a civil engineer with an extraordinary vision, turning construction dreams into reality with precision and flair.
